arts.ttl: Glasner: I’m pleased with the point
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says Crystal Palace can be satisfied after taking a point away from a draw with Southampton in which they struggled to reach the same levels as in recent matches.

arts.ttl: Franca's first Palace goal pushes Southampton to the brink
arts.sum: Southampton remain at the foot of the table but now move on to 10 points, while Crystal Palace stay in 12th place, as their five-match winning run in all competitions comes to an end. Matheus Franca’s injury-time header earned a point for Crystal Palace as they drew 1-1 at Southampton, who could be relegated this weekend.

arts.ttl: Ivan Juric not throwing in the towel as relegation looms for Southampton
arts.sum: The Saints could be relegated this weekend.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner: Crystal Palace were ‘mentally tired’ in Southampton clash after Fulham FA Cup win
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner was pleased with Crystal Palace’s late 1-1 draw at Southampton on Wednesday as he believed his side were mentally tired following their FA Cup quarter-final win over Fulham on Saturday. Franca’s goal salvaged a point for the Eagles and kept their unbeaten Premier League away run going from October 21.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner delighted for Matheus Franca after first Crystal Palace goal in late Southampton draw
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner was delighted for Matheus Franca after the Brazilian attacker scored his first goal for Crystal Palace in a late 1-1 draw at Southampton on Wednesday. “It’s his first goal for Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Matheus França’s header for Crystal Palace breaks Southampton hearts
arts.sum: Fear not, Derby County fans, hope remains. As this game headed into injury time, it looked as though the indignity they have carried for 17 years and counting would remain, with Southampton eyeing a rare win to take them past Derby’s all-time Premier League low of 11 points. But no team undo hard work like Southampton, and Matheus França’s late equalising header for Palace ensured Ivan Juric’s side remains bottom of the league, one point shy of Derby’s tally. The wait to consign such petty, but not insignificant matters, goes on. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-1 Crystal Palace: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Derby County Premier League record still possible for Saints
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Wednesday's Premier League clash between Southampton and Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Southampton denied rare victory by added-time equaliser from Matheus Franca
arts.sum: The Saints could be relegated at the weekend.

arts.ttl: Gallery: Palace face Southampton at St. Mary's
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are taking on Southampton at St Mary's Stadium tonight, looking to build on a brilliant recent away record – follow the best shots from the South Coast in our LIVE gallery below!

arts.ttl: Team News: One change for Palace at Southampton
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner has made one change to his Crystal Palace starting XI for Wednesday evening’s Premier League trip to Southampton.
